name: Nauseating Dart
text: You spit a poisonous stinger around the size of a quill at a creature within range, as though you had fired a dart from a blowgun. You must succeed at a ranged attack to hit your target. The stinger deals 1d2 points of piercing damage and poisons the target, causing it to become nauseated for 1 round unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save.
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则部分生效; 见文本
text_zh: 你吐出一根羽毛大小的毒刺，并将其射向范围内的一个生物，就如同你使用吹箭（blowgun）发射吹箭（Blowgun darts）一般。你必须成功进行一次远程攻击检定才能命中目标。毒刺会造成1d2点穿刺伤害，并且会使目标中毒。如果目标没有成功通过强韧豁免，便会反胃（nauseated）1轮。
